casebody.data:
Samuel MEJIA, Individually and as Administrator and Administrator ad Prosequendum of the Estate of Tania Mejia, Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
QUEST DIAGNOSTICS, INC., et al., Defendants. Quest Diagnostics Inc., et al., Third-Party Plaintiffs,
v.
Jacinto Fernandez, M.D., Third-Party Defendant-Movant,
and
Simon B. Santos, M.D., Third-Party Defendant. Samuel Mejia, Individually and as Administrator and Administrator ad Prosequendum of the Estate of Tania Mejia, Plaintiffs,
v.
Quest Diagnostics, Inc., et al., Defendants. Quest Diagnostics Inc., et al., Third-Party Plaintiffs,
v.
Jacinto Fernandez, M.D., and Simon B. Santos, M.D., Third-Party Defendants. M-1116 September Term 2018
082739 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 13, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal is granted.
